java/liquibase/preconditions/PreconditionFactory.java

00001 package liquibase.preconditions;
00002 
00003 import java.util.HashMap;
00004 import java.util.Map;
00005 
00006 public class PreconditionFactory {
00007     @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
00008     private final Map<String, Class> tagToClassMap;
00009 
00010     private static final PreconditionFactory instance = new PreconditionFactory();
00011 
00012     @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
00013     private PreconditionFactory() {
00014         tagToClassMap = new HashMap<String, Class>();
00015         Class[] preconditions = new Class[]{
00016                 AndPrecondition.class,
00017                 OrPrecondition.class,
00018                 NotPrecondition.class,
00019                 DBMSPrecondition.class,
00020                 RunningAsPrecondition.class,
00021                 SqlPrecondition.class,
00022         };
00023 
00024         try {
00025             for (Class<Precondition> preconditionClass : preconditions) {
00026                 Precondition precondition = preconditionClass.newInstance();
00027                 tagToClassMap.put(precondition.getTagName(), preconditionClass);
00028             }
00029         } catch (Exception e) {
00030             throw new RuntimeException(e);
00031         }
00032     }
00033 
00034     public static PreconditionFactory getInstance() {
00035         return instance;
00036     }
00037 
00041     public Precondition create(String tagName) {
00042         Class<?> aClass = tagToClassMap.get(tagName);
00043         if (aClass == null) {
00044             throw new RuntimeException("Unknown tag: " + tagName);
00045         }
00046         try {
00047             return (Precondition) aClass.newInstance();
00048         } catch (Exception e) {
00049             throw new RuntimeException(e);
00050         }
00051     }
00052 }
